<h3 id="X38108">X(38108) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(4), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-(b+c)*a^5-3*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+4*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38108) = X(3)-4*X(6666) = 2*X(3)+X(31672) = X(4)+5*X(18230) = X(4)+2*X(31658) = 2*X(5)+X(9) = 10*X(5)-X(5735) = 4*X(5)-X(5805) = 3*X(5)-X(38137) = 5*X(9)+X(5735) = 2*X(9)+X(5805) = 3*X(9)+2*X(38137) = 2*X(5735)-5*X(5805) = 3*X(5735)-10*X(38137) = X(5735)-5*X(38150) = 3*X(5805)-4*X(38137) = 3*X(5817)+X(21151) = 2*X(5817)+X(38122) = 8*X(6666)+X(31672) = 5*X(18230)-2*X(31658) = 2*X(21151)-3*X(38122)</b>
<p>X(38108) lies on these lines: {2,971}, {3,6666}, {4,18230}, {5,9}, {7,3090}, {11,15298}, {12,15299}, {30,21153}, {72,6886}, {140,5732}, {142,1656}, {144,5056}, {355,1001}, {381,516}, {390,5818}, {498,14100}, {499,8581}, {511,38145}, {515,16857}, {517,38037}, {518,5886}, {527,5055}, {542,38088}, {547,5843}, {631,36991}, {942,8232}, {952,38043}, {954,5722}, {990,17337}, {1479,15837}, {1482,24393}, {1503,38117}, {1698,11372}, {2550,6893}, {2800,38216}, {2801,38030}, {2829,38131}, {2951,31423}, {3091,5759}, {3243,5901}, {3305,8226}, {3358,6259}, {3545,21168}, {3564,38166}, {3628,20195}, {3634,9842}, {3824,5811}, {3826,6842}, {3851,31671}, {4208,22792}, {4312,24914}, {4321,15325}, {5044,6846}, {5067,36996}, {5071,6172}, {5219,10398}, {5223,8227}, {5296,36682}, {5587,34746}, {5603,5686}, {5659,30308}, {5698,6867}, {5728,6832}, {5729,21617}, {5733,16669}, {5777,6887}, {5784,6862}, {5785,30827}, {5787,11108}, {5789,9843}, {5790,5853}, {5809,24929}, {5840,38159}, {5842,38132}, {5844,38175}, {5850,10171}, {5856,23513}, {5857,38109}, {6245,16853}, {6594,10738}, {6705,16863}, {6829,37787}, {6852,10394}, {6864,31445}, {6881,8257}, {6928,15254}, {6975,29007}, {7174,15251}, {7308,8727}, {7988,31142}, {9654,12573}, {9780,35514}, {9856,19855}, {10172,38204}, {10384,31434}, {10392,13411}, {10739,28345}, {10883,35595}, {10884,17590}, {11230,38053}, {11375,18412}, {12618,17259}, {13727,17338}, {15587,26364}, {15699,38093}, {17260,36652}, {17582,34862}, {19875,24644}, {20117,30329}, {25722,27529}, {26685,36660}, {28194,38101}, {28204,38025}, {28234,38210}, {28629,31821}, {29335,36661}, {38042,38200}</p>
<p>
X(38108) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 5817}, {9, 38150}, {5603, 5686}, {38037, 38057}, {38059, 38158}, {38113, 38139}<br>
X(38108) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5805, 38150), (6173, 38171), (21153, 38113), (38031, 38059), (38053, 11230), (38057, 38179), (38093, 15699), (38122, 2), (38126, 38057), (38150, 5), (38171, 547), (38200, 38042), (38204, 10172)<br>
X(38108) = complement of X(21151)<br>
X(38108) = X(31672)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38108) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 18230, 31658), (5, 9, 5805), (1656, 5779, 142), (3091, 5759, 18482), (3628, 31657, 20195), (5223, 8227, 20330), (21153, 38113, 38067), (38037, 38179, 38126), (38075, 38082, 38067), (38082, 38139, 38113), (38180, 38181, 38043)<br>
</p>
